授業目的: The purpose of this class is for students to understand why US economy has been innovative.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the followings: (1) what is a proper corporate strategy to create innovation, (2) what is a proper role for universities to help corporate innovation, (3) whether or not competition policy has been helpful for innovation, and (4) whether or not strong patent protection is beneficial for innovation.
授業方法: This class is opened as face to face format. Students, who cannot attend in class due to health concerns or immigration regulation, can take recorded lectures on-demand base and in-class exams on LUNA.

備考　Note
Exam: 50 %. Presentation: 25%. Research paper: 25%. Each student has to conduct original research on case studies of innovation in the US, write a five page research paper, and make a ten minute presentation.
How to organize presentation classes depends on the number of registered students. Exam is in-class open-book exam, but it may he held on LUNA if the problem of COVID-19 becomes severe.
